item.description:
BriefDating for Western Massachusetts
Find Your Fall Foliage Sweetheart!

Cost: $33 (payment details at BriefDating.com)
Note: Usually 50 to 70 people attend BriefDating events including many people outside of Meetup.

Please note: pre-registration and pre-payment at BriefDating.com is required. No walk-ins allowed. Please see BriefDating.com for details.


BriefDating--A Great Way to Meet People!

* Meet many singles, quickly and easily
At our Western Mass speed dating events you
will have between 7 and 17 dates in one fun evening.

* Get a sense if you "click" in a few minutes
Each brief date is just 6 minutes.

* Safe and no pressure
You don't ask each other out. You just mark on your
Dating Card if you like the person. Contact information
is only sent when there is a match.

* BriefDating Works!
Our events have a 60% to 80% match rate!

"For quite a long time I've been wanting to try speed
dating. After being out of the dating world for many
years I wasn't sure how to get back in! I was really
feeling my lack of confidence and was quite
overwhelmed with 'how do I meet available men?'

The great thing about BriefDating is that the whole
reason all those men are there is because they are
available! And looking! And since we were all in the
same boat, feeling nervous together, we could take it
with a sense of humor and have a good laugh about it.
Actually getting to meet men in person in a structured
and supportive format made it so much easier. I really
had fun that night. It gave me my confidence back that
I really could enjoy the dating process." Andrea Rush

For more information and to sign up:
http://www.briefdatin...

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Speed Dating in Western Mass - Find Your Fall Foliage Sweetheart
